ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] About Darkfox...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll check it out.  :)  Thanks! At ... From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@redback.com] Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 5:14 PM To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
I'll check it out. :) Thanks!

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 5:14 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] About Darkfox...


if you have a good group, try nurga. that place is awesome. it's the total
''training
dungeon'' type thing. no wanderers, big rooms so crowd control is easy, not
too
many mobs packed together. we took a mid to high 30's group thru there last
night
and a few mobs were just starting to green out, so if you have a low 30's
group it should
be fine.

At 04:52 PM 2/26/01 -0500, you wrote:
>I finished 28, and did all of 29 in Dalnir's. It *is* pretty hairy, and
>I've moved out, and alternate between the FM giants and just inside OT for
>level 30. I really, really don't want to die while in level 30. hehe...
>
>I do want to go back for the dungeon bonus, though, once I'm safely into
31.
>:)
>
>At
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 4:34 PM
>To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] About Darkfox...
>
>
>Being a bard in Dalnir's is well... painful. Unless the new agro changes
>have helped I ended up dying way to much to make it worthwhile. Especially
>since at those levels you don't have the big rez capability. There are way
>too many casters in Dalnir's and that goo poison is ridiculous. I had a
few
>good xp nites, but also several with no or minus gain in 4 hours.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
>Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 2:26 PM
>To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] About Darkfox...
>
>
>I will, and thanks! :)
>
>It's too bad bards are so rare. I really think that any 4 people that get
>lucky enough to group with 2 good bards will resort to shouting, "Group of
4
>looking for bards!" :)
>
>I'd love to be in a group with one in Dalnir. One of us could go
>percussion, the other string. :)
>
>Atonal
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
>Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 4:14 PM
>To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [eqbards] About Darkfox...

>
>
> >Shoot me a tell sometime, if ya want. If you're around level
> >30, I'd love to group. I've always wanted to have another bard
> >in the group that knew enough about the songs and how to twist
> >to coordinate a 6 song crescendo of power that NONE CAN
> >WITHSTAND..MWHAHAHAHAA!
>
>I think Dark may be level 32 now, yes? *Smiles*
>
>Actually, if I remember correctly, Dark is a couple of levels ahead
>of me, so I would guess about 56 now.
>
>If you see me online, Atonal, feel free to give me a /tell.
>
>Be well,
>
>Gaelthorne
>
>
